articles.title: Intel apparently cancels its most intriguing CPU hybrid yet - TechRadar

articles.content: An Intel project around two years in the making (and likely several more years of research) has been canceled, meaning the company will no longer be channeling efforts into creating a CPU-VPU hybrid,… [+1755 chars]

articles.title: DART VADAR harnesses the force of enzymes for better RNA drugs: New, easy-to-design RNA-based sensor can detect and automatically respond to molecular triggers within cells - Science Daily

articles.content: More than twelve billion doses of mRNA vaccines have been administered globally since the start of the COVID pandemic, saving millions of lives. But RNA-based therapies for other diseases have so far… [+9973 chars]
